text: Any person who in good faith makes a report pursuant to this chapter or pursuant to any regulation promulgated under the authority of this chapter, shall not, by reason thereof, be personally liable in damages.

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Limited liability of persons making reports.
